members.name: MediaKeySession.closed
members.description: Returns a Promise signaling when a MediaKeySession closes. This promise can only be fulfilled and is never rejected. Closing a session means that licenses and keys associated with it are no longer valid for decrypting media data.

members.name: MediaKeySession.expiration
members.description: The time after which the keys in the current session can no longer be used to decrypt media data, or NaN if no such time exists. This value is determined by the CDM and measured in milliseconds since January 1, 1970, UTC. This value may change during a session lifetime, such as when an action triggers the start of a window.

members.name: MediaKeySession.keyStatuses
members.description: Contains a reference to a read-only MediaKeyStatusMap of the current session's keys and their statuses.

members.name: MediaKeySession.sessionId
members.description: Contains a unique string generated by the CDM for the current media object and its associated keys or licenses.

members.name: MediaKeySession.onkeystatuseschange
members.description: Sets the EventHandler called when there has been a change in the keys in a session or their statuses.

members.name: MediaKeySession.onmessage
members.description: Sets the EventHandler called when the content decryption module has generated a message for the session.

members.name: MediaKeySession.close()
members.description: Returns a Promise after notifying the current media session is no longer needed and that the CDM should release any resources associated with this object and close it.

members.name: MediaKeySession.generateRequest()
members.description: Returns a Promise after generating a media request based on initialization data.

members.name: MediaKeySession.load()
members.description: Returns a Promise that resolves to a boolean value after loading data for a specified session object.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: A unique string generated by the content decription module for the current media object and its associated keys or licenses.

members.name: MediaKeySession.remove()
members.description: Returns a Promise after removing any session data associated with the current object.

members.name: MediaKeySession.update()
members.description: Returns a Promise after loading messages and licenses to the CDM.
